translations: n.无产阶级，工人阶级；最下层阶级

sentences.sentence: The proletariat was then still a "class-in-itself".
sentences.translation: 这时，他们还是一个所谓“ 自在的阶级”。

sentences.sentence: He also recognized the "only the future but the emerging proletariat".
sentences.translation: 同时还认识到“惟新兴的无产者才有将来”。

sentences.sentence: He was actively involved in improving the living conditions of the proletariat.
sentences.translation: 作者积极推动提高下层阶级的生活状况。
